dependent_to.description:
SPIRAL is a program generation system for linear transforms and other
mathematical functions that produces very high performance code for a
wide spectrum of hardware platforms.
dependent_to.name: spiral-software

description:
This is the SPIRAL package for SIMT: SIMT, single instruction multiple
threads, is used to generate code for GPUs and multi-threading
aplications.
name: spiral-package-simt

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
